language.description: Subsystem for images/videos management, embedding and delivery.
language.form_initial_info_for_posts:
Individual media items are not tied to any document or post after being uploaded directly.
If you want your items to be available on main indexes, cancel now and create a post from the posts browser.
From there, use the buttons on the editor toolbar to upload and insert images or videos inside the post.
Ignoring this will cause your media to be ignored in the main indexes.

specs.title: Maximum item display width
specs.description:
This number is the default set to images and videos at the time they're inserted in the HTML editor.
Defaults to 720px.
This value may be overrriden by any responsive template.

specs.title: Use Triklet module for reporting media items?
specs.description: If the Triklet module is installed and enabled and this option is set to "Yes", online users that hit the "report media" link will be redirected to Triklet's New Ticket composition form instead of going to the Contact form.
